data.text: Having a brother-in-law is truly a gift to cherish
I hope your birthday is as happy and fun as you are dear brother-in-law
You deserve everything you want and more for your birthday
You have been a great brother-in-law So here i am wishing you the best of birthdays
I hope your birthday is half as amazing as you are if so it will be a great one
Happy birthday to a great friend and an even better brother-in-law
Brother in law is a wonderful gift that God send to you
I know our family is a bit weird but we are happy you are a part of it. Happy birthday brother-in-law
Here is hoping your birthday is filled with a bunch of good presents and lots of good company
I am proud to call you my brother-in-law and even more proud to call you a friend
Brother-in-law can also be a caring and special person in My life
Happy birthday I hope its a wonderful one
Another year down and many more to go I hope they are all filled with happiness
I hope this new year of your life will be full of light and want to see you happy and smiling always
Best Wishes for a dear and loving brother-in-law
Today is the day when God has sent a wonderful person on the earth you Happy birthday brother-in-law
Wish you a cheerful and adventurous life my dear brother-in-law
I am happy that my sister married such a standup guy
Not everyone is as lucky as I am to have such awesome brother-in-law
Happy birthday to my awsome brother-in-law
Happy birthday  bro-in-law I hope that you have marvelous day today filled with joy and happiness
Happy birthday bro-in-law I wish u to count your life by smiles not tears and your age by friend not years
I hope your birthday is as happy and fun as you are dear brother-in-law
Hey brother, I hope your birthday is filled with good beer, good friends, and great presents. Happy birthday
Happy birthday brother-in-law, I hope this next year is filled with even more accomplishments
